text: Hello guys, thank you all for the support provided in this channel. I am stumbling across another issue: when trying to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/conversations/create-custom-channels#file-attachments|publish a received message to HubSpot with an attachment>, no provided attachment type works except STICKER & VOICE_RECORDING. Regardless of the actual type of the attachment, any type except those results into `Unsupported file usage type OTHER, allowed types are: STICKER,VOICE_RECORDING` - any idea what I am missing here? Thank you :sunflower:

Note that using a Sticker type results in the attachment correctly reaching HubSpot in its correct format (document, voice recording, image, or video) - update: also eliminating the `fileUsageType` parameter from the requests is also working fine.
